root.name: Kage Densetsu: The Legend of Kage 2
root.description: Overview The Legend of Kage 2 for the Nintendo DS sports two playable characters and a new spell system driven by different-colored orbs which you can set in different formations to activate different magic. The game also sports a combo meter to keep track of how many consecutive enemies you've taken down without pausing. The Legend of Kage's trademark gravity-defying leaps have returned in all their glory and ridiculousness.
